name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: CD Projekt RED's third Witcher combines the series' non-linear storytelling with a sprawling open world that concludes the saga of Geralt of Rivia.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: One of the launch titles of the original Xbox, Halo: Combat Evolved is a sci-fi first-person shooter telling the tale of an advanced cybernetic super-soldier known as the "Master Chief".

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: One of the launch titles of the original Xbox, Halo: Combat Evolved is a sci-fi first-person shooter telling the tale of an advanced cybernetic super-soldier known as the "Master Chief".

name: Advanced Tactics Gold
description: Advanced Tactics Gold is a turn-based tactical wargame with an endless number of scenarios thanks to its random game mode and scenario editor.

name: League of Legends
description: A free-to-play competitive MOBA game with a large following in eSports. From the original developers of DotA: Allstars, the game expands the gameplay found in DotA by adding persistent Summoner profiles and a variety of original champions who fight for you on the battlefield against bots or one another.

name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
description: Counter-Strike gets a updated look (thanks to a series of development teams) in this 2004 update, adding updated graphics, new bots, and two unique single-player campaigns.

name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
description: Counter-Strike gets a updated look (thanks to a series of development teams) in this 2004 update, adding updated graphics, new bots, and two unique single-player campaigns.

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
description: The fourth iteration of Valve's team-based modern-military first-person shooter, rebuilt and constantly expanded for competitive play with new maps, new weapons, and new gameplay mechanics. It was later made free-to-play and most versions were later replaced with the sequel.

name: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike 2 brings twenty years of Counter-Strike experience into Source 2 Engine.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds
description: A survival-shooter led by the modder behind the Battle Royale mods for the ArmA series. It is one of the progenitors of the "battle royale" sub-genre, pitting 100 players in a large empty location where they must scavenge for weapons and fight to the death.

name: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Tapout
description: This is a game based on the sport of MMA.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown
description: The fourth mainline game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is a competitive multiplayer first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft Montreal. Players chose from a large roster of Operators with their own weapons and abilities to win round-based attack and defend matches.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring by FromSoftware is a collaboration between Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R.R. Martin.

name: Dark Sun: Shattered Lands
description: Dark Sun: Shattered Lands was released in 1993 and is the first Dungeons and Dragons game to use the Dark Sun campaign setting. While fairly obscure outside of enthusiast circles, it is praised for its tactical, turn-based combat.

name: Jurassic Park: Survival
description: Planned to coincide with Jurassic Park 3, Survival was to see players take on dinosaurs and terrorists alike as they fought to escape Isla Sorna. The game, however, quickly went extinct.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
description: An adventure/brawler based on Journey to the West and other Chinese literature and myth

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle follows the titular character on his journey to discover the mysterious "Great Circle" and stop the villainous forces trying to exploit its power in a globetrotting action-adventure game from the makers of Wolfenstein.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action role-playing game by CD Projekt RED based on the pen and paper RPG Cyberpunk 2020.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description:
An ancient evil has returned to Baldur's Gate, intent on devouring it from the inside out. 
Combat is Turn-based instead of Real-Time with Pauses style combat as previous main installments in the Baldur's Gate series

name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
description: An action-adventure game in the Star Wars series from the studio behind the Titanfall series, following a Jedi Padawan who turns fugitive after escaping the Jedi Purge.

name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: A sequel to Hollow Knight following the adventures of Hornet.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action role-playing game by CD Projekt RED based on the pen and paper RPG Cyberpunk 2020.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear is a tactical first-person shooter computer game developed and published by Red Storm Entertainment and Ubisoft. It is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Rainbow Six game based on the Tom Clancy novel of the same name.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is a competitive multiplayer first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft Montreal. Players chose from a large roster of Operators with their own weapons and abilities to win round-based attack and defend matches.

name: Call of Duty 3
description: The third main installment of the well-known first-person shooter series, Call of Duty 3 returns to World War II Europe in an inter-connected campaign that switches between America, British, Canadian, and Polish forces during the liberation of France.

name: Anomaly Warzone Earth Mobile Campaign
description: A new 15 mission campaign taken from the mobile version of Anomaly: Warzone Earth and translated for PC, Mac, and Linux.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0
description: A sequel to the free-to-play large-scale multiplayer spin-off of the Call of Duty series, integrating with the series' 19th and 20th entries while adding a new extraction-shooter game mode.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
description: The last installment of the Modern Warfare trilogy brings World War 3 to the world of Call of Duty. While the U.S., British, and French armed forces try to push back the Russian invasion, the disavowed Task Force 141 begin their hunt for international terrorist Vladimir Makarov.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
description: The 16th installment of the Call of Duty series is a reboot of the modern-military Modern Warfare sub-series, reworking characters and events into a 2019 setting.

description: Apex lets the player make their own car company. The player gets to customize their company, choose between concept drawings and race them against licensed vehicles.

name: Racing Apex
description: An arcade style racing game meant to have a throw back visual style to classic early polygonal racing games such as Virtua Racing.

name: Forza Motorsport 6: Apex
description: Apex takes elements from Forza Motorsport 6, brings them up to PC visual standards, and exists as a free game.

name: Operation Apex
description: Operation Apex is an underwater exploration and adventure game for HTC Vive.

name: Super Mario All-Stars & Super Mario World
description: An updated version of Super Mario All-Stars bundled for a short period of time with the Super Nintendo Entertainment System from December 1994, featuring the inclusion of Super Mario World.

name: Mario Superstar Baseball
description: Mario and friends head to the field in this crazy baseball game. Play through several games against iconic captains in the highly replayable single player mode or play with friends in a baseball game, minigames, or on the Toy Field.

name: Dr. Mario 64
description: Dr. Mario 64, cure that flu.

name: Super Mario World
description: One of the few launch titles of the SNES (and bundled with the system in North America and Europe), the fifth main game in the Super Mario series brings the Mario brothers into the mysterious Dinosaur Land. It marks the first appearance of Mario's dinosaur companions, known as Yoshi.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
description: Mario and company tee it up at the Mushroom Kingdom in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, which marks the first appearance of Mario Golf on the GameCube.

name: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island
description: A spin-off of the Super Mario platforming series, Yoshi's Island puts players in control of a tribe of Yoshies as they guide the infant Mario past the forces of the evil Kamek.

name: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 takes the Mario franchise into polygonal worlds, setting numerous standards for 3D game design along the way.

name: Mario Party 5
description: Mario Party 5 is the fifth installment in Nintendo's long running series. It features new modes, along with 75 all-new mini-games.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Sportfischen Professional
description: Sportfischen Professional is a fishing simulation developed by Radon Labs for the PC. It features detailed 3D graphics, 7 different fishing areas and many playing modes.

name: Sid Meier's CivNet
description: A release of Sid Meier's Civilization but with added online multiplay.

name: SingStar '80s
description: The fourth installment in the SingStar franchise and the first era-specific release, SingStar '80s compiles chart-topping songs from throughout the decade.

name: Army Men Air Combat: The Elite Missions
Close Combat: Invasion - Normandy
description: Close Combat V returns to the roots of the series and lets the player storm or defend the beaches of Normandy during the D-Day once again.

name: Simon the Sorcerer II: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
description: A point-and-click adventure game. Simon is transported by a wardrobe back to the fantasy world.

name: UFO: Alien Invasion
description: UFO: Alien Invasion is a game in which the player controls human special forces (PHALANX) in the fight against alien invaders. It is an opensource game based on and heavily influenced by the X-COM games.

name: Beyond Oasis
description: An Action/RPG for the Sega Genesis.

name: Thexder 95
description: Thexder 95 (a.k.a. "Thexder for Windows 95") is a re-imagining of the original DOS action game. The game features all new levels, cut-scenes, and a multiple window interface.

name: Pokmon XD: Gale of Darkness
description: A Pokemon RPG focusing on the purification of Shadow Pokemon, focusing on XD001, or Shadow Lugia.

name: Thexder
description: An action shooter game featuring a giant robot which can transform into a jet. Trapped within a mysterious facility, the goal is to navigate 16 maze-like levels and stay alive long enough to destroy the central computer.

name: Fire Hawk: Thexder the Second Contact
description: Fire Hawk (a.k.a. "Thexder 2") is the sequel to the original Japanese action game. It features improved graphics, sound and gameplay.

name: Thexder Neo
description: Thexder Neo is a remake of the 1985 transforming robot themed shooter Thexder.  The game is available on the Playstation Network as a download for the PSP.

name: Tiny War XD
description: Tiny War XD is a management game for mobile platforms.

name: High School DxD: New Fight
description: Free to play RPG based on the High School DxD franchise.

name: High School DxD
description: A 3DS game based on the Ecchi light novel and anime.

name: XDR X-Dazedly-Ray
description: A Japan-only horizontal shoot em up for the Sega Mega Drive.

name: Symphogear XD Unlimited
description: Symphogear XD Unlimited is a "symphonic battle RPG" for Android and iOS, taking place after the events of Senki Zessh Symphogear GX.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Return to Sector 9
description: Sequel to Ambush in Sector 9

name: Draconus
description: Burn opponents, explore different screens and discover new artifacts

name: Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs
description: A sidescrolling shooter based on the classic 80s animated series.

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Tomoe Shougakkou Daiundoukai
description: Card Captor Sakura: Tomoe Shougakkou Daiundoukai is a Japanese only Game Boy Color game.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action role-playing game by CD Projekt RED based on the pen and paper RPG Cyberpunk 2020.

name: Black Mesa
description: A fan-made re-imagining of the 1998 FPS hit Half-Life.

name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord
description: Bannerlord is the first proper sequel to the open-ended medieval combat game Mount & Blade.

name: Ray's the Dead
description: A puzzle/strategy game where players control a squad of zombies.

name: Swimsanity!
description: Swimsanity is a four-player, underwater brawler.

name: Serious Sam 4
description: The fourth entry in the Serious Sam series and a prequel to Serious Sam 3: BFE.

name: Nebulous
description: Nebulous is much like the new hit game, "Agar.io", except this game is on android and is designed slightly different.

name: Nebulous
description: Deceptively Simple Blob Capturing.

name: Nebulous: Fleet Command
description: NEBULOUS: Fleet Command

name: Nebulous

name: Nebulous
description: Deceptively Simple Blob Capturing.

name: Nebulous: Fleet Command
description: NEBULOUS: Fleet Command

name: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
description: A top-down isometric helicopter shoot 'em up originally for the Sega Genesis, which was later ported to a variety of platforms. It is best known for its open-ended mission design and was followed by several sequels.

name: Breakfree
description: Breakfree is a block-breaking game that is similar to Breakout; however, it is played from a first-person perspective.

name: The Chessmaster 2000
description: One of the most well-known comptuer chess games of the 1980's, The Chessmaster 2000 features an advanced chess engine by David Kittinger along with numerous training tools and mouse controls.

name: Bass Avenger
description: Put on some tight red spandex pants and grab your four-string in this atrocious fishing game from S&S Interactive.

name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2007
description: Smackdown Vs. Raw 2007 is the third installment in the Smackdown Vs. Raw series.

name: Camelot Warriors
description: Camelot Warriors is an action / adventure 8-bit game developed in Spain by Dinamic Software. It was very popular in Spain and was even a packed-in game (along others) for a long time in Armstrad CPCs.

name: Super Spy Hunter
description: A vehicular combat game for the NES. It was originally called Battle Formula in Japan, but Sunsoft purchased the license to Spy Hunter and was able to market the game as a sequel to the Spy Hunter game.

name: Fritz 9: Play Chess
description: Fritz 9: Play Chess is a chess game for the PC developed by ChessBase. It features and advanced chess engine, video tutorials, online play and is able to analyze your chess ability as well as those of great players from the past.

name: The Real Deal 2
description: The Real Deal 2 is a collection of 17 classic card games.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

description: Nebulous is much like the new hit game, "Agar.io", except this game is on android and is designed slightly different.

name: Nebulous
description: Deceptively Simple Blob Capturing.

name: Nebulous: Fleet Command
description: NEBULOUS: Fleet Command

name: Un Juego de Huevos
description: Un Juego de Huevos is a platformer for Zeebo, based on the Mexican animated film "Una Pelcula de Huevos"

name: slither.io
description: As a snake, players must eat to grow larger while avoiding collisions with other players.

name: The Real Deal 2
description: The Real Deal 2 is a collection of 17 classic card games.

name: Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame: Topsy Turvy Games
description: A minigame collection featuring scenarios based on Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame.

name: Mystery Case Files: Madame Fate
description: Madame Fate has foreseen her death at the stroke of midnight & asked for your help in investigating the other carnival workers to see their future at midnight in order to discover her killer. Each suspect with thier own motive might be the killer but only you can discover the hidden secrets inside Madame Fate's crystal ball.

name: Wordament
description: A free-to-play, ad-supported word puzzle game released by Microsoft. Considered a "MMO" word puzzle game due to everybody playing the same puzzle at the same time.

name: Nodame Cantabile
description: Nintendo DS rhythm game based on the popular Anime, Nodame Cantabile. Using the stylus you tap and make motions on the touchscreen with the music.

name: 9: The Dark Side of Notre Dame
Wordament Snap Attack
description: Wordament mixed with building letters

name: Puzz 3D: Notre Dame Cathedral
description: Build a 3D puzzle of Notre Dame Cathedral and explore the history and interior of the famous landmark.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: slither.io
description: As a snake, players must eat to grow larger while avoiding collisions with other players.

name: Super Mario All-Stars & Super Mario World
description: An updated version of Super Mario All-Stars bundled for a short period of time with the Super Nintendo Entertainment System from December 1994, featuring the inclusion of Super Mario World.

name: Mario Superstar Baseball
description: Mario and friends head to the field in this crazy baseball game. Play through several games against iconic captains in the highly replayable single player mode or play with friends in a baseball game, minigames, or on the Toy Field.

name: Dr. Mario 64
description: Dr. Mario 64, cure that flu.

name: Super Mario World
description: One of the few launch titles of the SNES (and bundled with the system in North America and Europe), the fifth main game in the Super Mario series brings the Mario brothers into the mysterious Dinosaur Land. It marks the first appearance of Mario's dinosaur companions, known as Yoshi.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
description: Mario and company tee it up at the Mushroom Kingdom in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, which marks the first appearance of Mario Golf on the GameCube.

name: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island
description: A spin-off of the Super Mario platforming series, Yoshi's Island puts players in control of a tribe of Yoshies as they guide the infant Mario past the forces of the evil Kamek.

name: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 takes the Mario franchise into polygonal worlds, setting numerous standards for 3D game design along the way.

name: Mario Party 5
description: Mario Party 5 is the fifth installment in Nintendo's long running series. It features new modes, along with 75 all-new mini-games.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Super Buster Bros.
description: Super Buster Bros. is a shooter for SNES.  The player shoots upwards to pop bubbles that bounce around the screen.

name: Buster Bros. Collection
description: A collection of three Buster Bros./Pang games for Playstation.

name: Electric Crayon 3.1: Super Mario Bros & Friends: When I Grow Up
description: Electric Crayon 3.1:Super Mario Bros & Friends: When I Grow Up is a painting video game for children.

name: Super Mario Bros. Deluxe
description: Super Mario Bros. Deluxe is a 1999 remake of the 1985 classic, Super Mario Bros. It featured many updates from the original version including fixes for several glitches and the ability to play as Luigi at any time.

name: Super Mario Bros. 2
description: Mario and his friends find themselves in the mysterious world of Sub-Con, where they must fight new enemies (with new techniques) to stop the master plans of the evil toad king, Wart.

name: Jack Bros.
description: Known as Jakku Burazsu no Meiro de Hh!?, (or"Jack Brothers' Hee-Ho at the Labyrinth!") in Japan, it is one of the couple dozen Virtual Boy games ever released worldwide.

name: New Super Mario Bros.
description: Mario must use all of his abilities as well as several new power ups to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser Junior in the first Super Mario Bros. game for the DS.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Super Mario Bros. 3 sends Mario on a whole new adventure across diverse worlds and sporting strange new suits and abilities.

name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.6: Puzzle & Action + Bonanza Bros.
description: A remastering of two Sega classics starring Mobo & Robo.

name: Super Mario Bros. / Duck Hunt
description: A compilation of Duck Hunt and Super Mario Bros. Duck Hunt featured a lightgun shooting game while Super Mario Bros. is a well-known platformer.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
description: A top-down isometric helicopter shoot 'em up originally for the Sega Genesis, which was later ported to a variety of platforms. It is best known for its open-ended mission design and was followed by several sequels.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16: Licensed to Drive
description: Like Mario Party but bad (and with an inappropriate name)!

name: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden: Kieta Ougon Kiseru
description: An RPG spin-off of Konami's Ganbare Goemon series, where Goemon has to solve the mystery of his missing pipe.

name: Game Box Srie Corridas
description: Game Box Srie Corridas is a compilation of three racing games that was published by Tec Toy and developed by Sega. It was released in 1994 in South America and Korea

name: Serious Sam
description: Serious Sam on the Xbox packs in the first two PC releases along with slick graphical makeover and new multi-player options.

name: Math Blaster: Episode 1 - In Search of Spot
description: A sci-fi shoot 'em up which uses mathematical problems as gameplay mechanics. It has a space adventure theme.

name: Serious Sam: Next Encounter
description: A console-exclusive installment in the Serious Sam series.

name: House of the Dead 2 & 3 Return
description: A single-disc compilation of the second and third House of the Dead games. The game uses the Wii Remote in place of a gun controller.

name: Enraged Rocket House
description: Go forth Ice Cream Man!

name: Close Combat: Invasion - Normandy
description: Close Combat V returns to the roots of the series and lets the player storm or defend the beaches of Normandy during the D-Day once again.

name: The Textorcist: The Story of Ray Bibbia
description: Typing is the only escape from hell in The Textorcist.

name: Detector
description: A 2D top down shooter.

name: Touhou 16.5 - Violet Detector
description: The 16.5th game of the Touhou franchise featuring Sumireko Usami. It's a spin-off game with separately selectable Spell Cards and features the camera mechanic of Shoot the Bullet and Double Spoiler.

name: Mahjong Hana no Momoko Gumi
description: An early mahjong title from Nichibutsu.

name: Summon Night Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi
The Revenge of Shinobi
description: Often considered the franchise's pinnacle, The Revenge of Shinobi features a wide variety of locations, and a soundtrack by Yuzo Koshiro of Streets of Rage fame. In early versions, it also featured bosses who bore a striking resemblance to characters not owned by Sega.

name: Alchemist Marie & Elie: Futari no Atelier
description: A role-playing game in the Atelier series for Wonderswan.

name: The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
description: A NES platformer where you play as Fred Flintstone as his pets Dino and Hoppy are kidnapped by a collector from the future. A small alien comes back in time to help them, and Fred must find the parts of his time machine to save them.

name: Hokuto no Ken 7 : Seiken Retsuden: Denshousha e no Michi
description: A fighting game based on the Fist of the North Star franchise. It is the third of three FoNS games for the Super Famicom.

name: Super Spy Hunter
description: A vehicular combat game for the NES. It was originally called Battle Formula in Japan, but Sunsoft purchased the license to Spy Hunter and was able to market the game as a sequel to the Spy Hunter game.

name: Metal Slug X: Super Vehicle - 001
description: Metal Slug X is an upgraded version of Metal Slug 2, featuring the Metal Slug 3 game engine. The story remains the same but there are slight changes to music, gameplay and interactions.

name: Super Thunder Blade
description: Super Thunder Blade is a shooter casting the player as a helicopter pilot tasked with, almost, single-handedly defeating an enemy army. Super Thunder Blade was one of the two original Japanese launch titles for the Mega Drive. The other was Space Harrier II.

name: Quattro Super Hits
description: Quattro Super Hits is a complication of four classic Codemaster games that was released for systems like the Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum.

name: Super Jazz Man
description: Super Jazz Man is a superhero adventure game by Herculean Effort Productions. It plays very similarly to classic LucasArts adventure games.

name: Super Play Action Football
description: Super Play Action Football is one of the only games that features High School, College, and NFL teams.

name: Super Monaco GP
description: Considered one of the best racing games of the 16-bit era, Super Monaco GP puts the player in the driver seat for a simulation of the 1989/90 F1 season. The game features both an arcade and 2-year championship modes.

name: Super Mario All-Stars & Super Mario World
description: An updated version of Super Mario All-Stars bundled for a short period of time with the Super Nintendo Entertainment System from December 1994, featuring the inclusion of Super Mario World.

name: Super Xevious
description: A vertical shoot 'em up and an update to the original game that contains new enemies.

description: One of the few launch titles of the SNES (and bundled with the system in North America and Europe), the fifth main game in the Super Mario series brings the Mario brothers into the mysterious Dinosaur Land. It marks the first appearance of Mario's dinosaur companions, known as Yoshi.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
description: Mario and company tee it up at the Mushroom Kingdom in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, which marks the first appearance of Mario Golf on the GameCube.

name: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island
description: A spin-off of the Super Mario platforming series, Yoshi's Island puts players in control of a tribe of Yoshies as they guide the infant Mario past the forces of the evil Kamek.

name: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 takes the Mario franchise into polygonal worlds, setting numerous standards for 3D game design along the way.

name: Mario Party 5
description: Mario Party 5 is the fifth installment in Nintendo's long running series. It features new modes, along with 75 all-new mini-games.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Super Spy Hunter
description: A vehicular combat game for the NES. It was originally called Battle Formula in Japan, but Sunsoft purchased the license to Spy Hunter and was able to market the game as a sequel to the Spy Hunter game.

name: Metal Slug X: Super Vehicle - 001
description: Metal Slug X is an upgraded version of Metal Slug 2, featuring the Metal Slug 3 game engine. The story remains the same but there are slight changes to music, gameplay and interactions.

name: Super Thunder Blade
description: Super Thunder Blade is a shooter casting the player as a helicopter pilot tasked with, almost, single-handedly defeating an enemy army. Super Thunder Blade was one of the two original Japanese launch titles for the Mega Drive. The other was Space Harrier II.

name: Quattro Super Hits
description: Quattro Super Hits is a complication of four classic Codemaster games that was released for systems like the Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum.

name: Super Jazz Man
description: Super Jazz Man is a superhero adventure game by Herculean Effort Productions. It plays very similarly to classic LucasArts adventure games.

name: Super Play Action Football
description: Super Play Action Football is one of the only games that features High School, College, and NFL teams.

name: Super Monaco GP
description: Considered one of the best racing games of the 16-bit era, Super Monaco GP puts the player in the driver seat for a simulation of the 1989/90 F1 season. The game features both an arcade and 2-year championship modes.

name: Super Mario All-Stars & Super Mario World
description: An updated version of Super Mario All-Stars bundled for a short period of time with the Super Nintendo Entertainment System from December 1994, featuring the inclusion of Super Mario World.

name: Super Xevious
description: A vertical shoot 'em up and an update to the original game that contains new enemies.

name: Jane's Combat Simulations: Air Superiority Collection
Mario Superstar Baseball
description: Mario and friends head to the field in this crazy baseball game. Play through several games against iconic captains in the highly replayable single player mode or play with friends in a baseball game, minigames, or on the Toy Field.

name: Dr. Mario 64
description: Dr. Mario 64, cure that flu.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Un Juego de Huevos
description: Un Juego de Huevos is a platformer for Zeebo, based on the Mexican animated film "Una Pelcula de Huevos"

name: Wild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa
description: Wild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa is a side-scrolling, action game.  The four COW-boys draw their pistols "Sunset Riders" style to get those dastardly varmints out of their town!

name: Black Mesa
description: A fan-made re-imagining of the 1998 FPS hit Half-Life.

name: Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama!
description: The fourth entry in the Class of Heroes series of Wizardry inspired first person dungeon crawlers.

name: Umesawa Yukari no Igo Seminar
description: The illustrious Yukari Umesawa teaches players to play Go.

name: Ohimesama: Jiku wo Koeru
description: A visual novel.

name: Promesa
description: An exploration game developed by Julin Palacios.

name: Operation: Black Mesa
description: Experience the Half-Life expansion packs like never before. Operation: Black Mesa features reimaginings of both Half-Life Opposing Force and Half-Life Blue Shift through two unique campaigns. How will you survive the Black Mesa Incident? It's time to choose.

name: Super Mario All-Stars & Super Mario World
description: An updated version of Super Mario All-Stars bundled for a short period of time with the Super Nintendo Entertainment System from December 1994, featuring the inclusion of Super Mario World.

name: Mario Superstar Baseball
description: Mario and friends head to the field in this crazy baseball game. Play through several games against iconic captains in the highly replayable single player mode or play with friends in a baseball game, minigames, or on the Toy Field.

name: Dr. Mario 64
description: Dr. Mario 64, cure that flu.

description: One of the few launch titles of the SNES (and bundled with the system in North America and Europe), the fifth main game in the Super Mario series brings the Mario brothers into the mysterious Dinosaur Land. It marks the first appearance of Mario's dinosaur companions, known as Yoshi.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
description: Mario and company tee it up at the Mushroom Kingdom in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, which marks the first appearance of Mario Golf on the GameCube.

name: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 takes the Mario franchise into polygonal worlds, setting numerous standards for 3D game design along the way.

name: Mario Party 5
description: Mario Party 5 is the fifth installment in Nintendo's long running series. It features new modes, along with 75 all-new mini-games.

name: Mario Pinball Land
description: A pinball game starring Mario.

name: Mario Teaches Typing 2
description: Mario Teaches Typing 2 is the sequel to the original with new typing games

name: Agar.io
description: A multiplayer game where players control a cell with the goal of eating smaller cells and becoming bigger.

name: Super Buster Bros.
description: Super Buster Bros. is a shooter for SNES.  The player shoots upwards to pop bubbles that bounce around the screen.

name: Buster Bros. Collection
description: A collection of three Buster Bros./Pang games for Playstation.

name: Electric Crayon 3.1: Super Mario Bros & Friends: When I Grow Up
description: Electric Crayon 3.1:Super Mario Bros & Friends: When I Grow Up is a painting video game for children.

name: Super Mario Bros. Deluxe
description: Super Mario Bros. Deluxe is a 1999 remake of the 1985 classic, Super Mario Bros. It featured many updates from the original version including fixes for several glitches and the ability to play as Luigi at any time.

name: Super Mario Bros. 2
description: Mario and his friends find themselves in the mysterious world of Sub-Con, where they must fight new enemies (with new techniques) to stop the master plans of the evil toad king, Wart.

name: Jack Bros.
description: Known as Jakku Burazsu no Meiro de Hh!?, (or"Jack Brothers' Hee-Ho at the Labyrinth!") in Japan, it is one of the couple dozen Virtual Boy games ever released worldwide.

name: New Super Mario Bros.
description: Mario must use all of his abilities as well as several new power ups to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser Junior in the first Super Mario Bros. game for the DS.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Super Mario Bros. 3 sends Mario on a whole new adventure across diverse worlds and sporting strange new suits and abilities.

name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.6: Puzzle & Action + Bonanza Bros.
description: A remastering of two Sega classics starring Mobo & Robo.

name: Super Mario Bros. / Duck Hunt
description: A compilation of Duck Hunt and Super Mario Bros. Duck Hunt featured a lightgun shooting game while Super Mario Bros. is a well-known platformer.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: slither.io
description: As a snake, players must eat to grow larger while avoiding collisions with other players.

name: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
description: A top-down isometric helicopter shoot 'em up originally for the Sega Genesis, which was later ported to a variety of platforms. It is best known for its open-ended mission design and was followed by several sequels.

name: Breakfree
description: Breakfree is a block-breaking game that is similar to Breakout; however, it is played from a first-person perspective.

name: The Chessmaster 2000
description: One of the most well-known comptuer chess games of the 1980's, The Chessmaster 2000 features an advanced chess engine by David Kittinger along with numerous training tools and mouse controls.

name: Bass Avenger
description: Put on some tight red spandex pants and grab your four-string in this atrocious fishing game from S&S Interactive.

name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2007
description: Smackdown Vs. Raw 2007 is the third installment in the Smackdown Vs. Raw series.

name: Camelot Warriors
description: Camelot Warriors is an action / adventure 8-bit game developed in Spain by Dinamic Software. It was very popular in Spain and was even a packed-in game (along others) for a long time in Armstrad CPCs.

name: Super Spy Hunter
description: A vehicular combat game for the NES. It was originally called Battle Formula in Japan, but Sunsoft purchased the license to Spy Hunter and was able to market the game as a sequel to the Spy Hunter game.

name: Fritz 9: Play Chess
description: Fritz 9: Play Chess is a chess game for the PC developed by ChessBase. It features and advanced chess engine, video tutorials, online play and is able to analyze your chess ability as well as those of great players from the past.

name: The Real Deal 2
description: The Real Deal 2 is a collection of 17 classic card games.
